cs.ualberta.conditionlog.model
Class DatabaseHelper

java.lang.Object
  SQLiteOpenHelper
      cs.ualberta.conditionlog.model.DatabaseHelper

public class DatabaseHelper
extends SQLiteOpenHelper

Controls the ConditionLog's database, allowing connections to be made with it.

Author:
tgriffit

Method Detail

onCreate

public void onCreate(SQLiteDatabase db)
Overrides the default onCreate. When the DatabaseHelper is created it creates all of the tables used if they do not already exist.

onUpgrade

public void onUpgrade(SQLiteDatabase db,
                      int oldVersion,
                      int newVersion)
Overrides the default onUpgrade. If the database version is changed, all the tables are dropped and re-created.
